channel.title: HL Opposing Force User Created Patch For SP Maps
channel.description:
HL Opposing Force user created patch for single player maps.
Info and patch can be found here.
[url='https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life-opposing-force/downloads/half-life-opposing-force-sp-map-fixes-patch']https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life-opposing-force/downloads/half-life-opposing-force-sp-map-fixes-patch[/url]

item.title: HL Opposing Force User Created Patch For SP Maps
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I’m sure It’d be far more effort to sort out the legalities and technicals of including this guy’s fixes than to fix a few bugs themselves.

Read full topic
item.source: HL Opposing Force User Created Patch For SP Maps
